A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please send me a refund for my money after having been swindled into watching any of this absolute crapfest of a film.  How is it even possible that the persons creating\, producing\, and writing this dung are even in the position to do so?  I have to give credit to these people for not just having horrible sequences\, but actually stringing them together\, one after another after another into a 2+ hour long fart. Amazing! I hated every bit of it\, not just some parts.  I just have no words for this colossal failure.
